metadata.description: Can everyone become a hero? In 1977, Jean Van Hamme and Dany asked us the question with this one-shot dedicated to a group of men and women very ordinary that a plane crash in the middle of the forest would force to go to the end of them- same. Twenty years later, the two authors came together for a sequel that sees the survivors of the accident mysteriously disappear one after the other. The opportunity to (re) discover the talent of Dany in the field of realism and one of the best scenarios of Van Hamme.
metadata.name: Story Without a Hero
